data.description: Examines various mediated cultural forms such as broadcasting, news, performance, music, film, or social media created and used across regions and countries in Africa, addressing issues such as cultural identity, nation building, constraints on expression, access, and reception, and the interaction of global and African cultural forms.
data.title: TOPICS IN AFRICAN CULTURAL STUDIES

data.description: Special topics across various genres of African Cultural Studies covering cultural production, circulation, consumption, and meaning making in Africa.
data.title: SPECIAL TOPICS
